name: The Dicematurge
description:
Cursed with randomness, a dicemage must make their way through the dungeon or perish within.

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot - Left Click

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam by:

Team Lead - ShockingShots - Twitter

Programming - Philip (Silevran) - itch.io

Programming - John Hauge - itch.io

UI - Sara Bustamante - Portfolio

Art - Jonathan Michiemo - Twitter
